snippet: In a speech to the Conservative Political Action Conference, Marco Rubio extolled the promise of America and how it is being threatened by President Obama.
abstract: In a speech to the Conservative Political Action Conference, Marco Rubio extolled the promise of America and how it is being threatened by President Obama.
lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio's speech Thursday before a packed hotel ballroom on the opening day of the Conservative Political Action Conference was warmly received, but it was preceded by an even warmer introduction.

headline.main: Rubio Receives Warm Reception at CPAC
